# <a name="export-your-contacts-in-outlookcom"></a><span data-ttu-id="8dd6f-102">Izvoz kontakata u Outlook.com</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8dd6f-102">Export your contacts in Outlook.com</span></span>

1. <span data-ttu-id="8dd6f-103">Idi na [ljude](https://outlook.live.com/people/)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8dd6f-103">Go to [People](https://outlook.live.com/people/)</span></span> <img src='data:image/png;base64,' />
<span data-ttu-id="8dd6f-104">.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8dd6f-104">.</span></span>
2. <span data-ttu-id="8dd6f-105">Na vrhu stranice izaberite stavku **Upravljaj** \> **izvozom**.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8dd6f-105">At the top of the page, select **Manage** \> **Export**.</span></span>
3. <span data-ttu-id="8dd6f-106">Odaberite da li želite da izvezete sve kontakte ili samo kontakte iz određene fascikle i da izaberete opciju " **Izvezi**".</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8dd6f-106">Choose if you want to export all contacts or only contacts from a specific folder and select **Export**.</span></span>
4. <span data-ttu-id="8dd6f-107">Na dnu stranice izaberite " **Sačuvaj** " i "Kontakti. csv" će biti sačuvani u podrazumevanoj fascikli za preuzimanje.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8dd6f-107">At the bottom of the page, select **Save** and "contacts.csv" will be saved in your default Downloads folder.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8dd6f-108">Da biste odabrali gde ćete sačuvati. csv datoteku, kliknite na strelicu pored stavke Sačuvaj i izaberite stavku **Sačuvaj kao**.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8dd6f-108">To choose where to save the .csv file, select the arrow next to Save and select **Save as**.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8dd6f-109">Više informacija potražite u članku [Izvoz kontakata iz Outlook.com u csv datoteku](https://support.office.com/article/578cca22-3550-4c73-b3f0-9978cfeac83f?wt.mc_id=Office_Outlook_com_Alchemy).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8dd6f-109">For more information, see [Export contacts from Outlook.com to a CSV file](https://support.office.com/article/578cca22-3550-4c73-b3f0-9978cfeac83f?wt.mc_id=Office_Outlook_com_Alchemy).</span></span>
